description.en: Avataram of Yajnavalkya Maharshi happened in kArtika shulka dwadashi in Shatabhishak Nakshatram/Dhanurlagnam.

shlokas:
vandE'haM  maGgaLAtmAnaM  bhAsvantaM  vEdavigraham.
yAjJavalkyaM  munizrESThaM  jISNuM  hariharaprabham..
jitEndriyaM  jitakrOdhaM  sadA  dhyAnaparAyaNam.
AnandanilayaM  vandE  yOgAnandamunIzvaram..
